none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on April 30, 2013 Description from Terminal Escape:
Lazy and exceptionally pleasant garage/popsters from Michigan, RADIANT MARKS manage to set a vibe mere moments into the cassette and spend the next 20 minutes building on it. Distant, wistful vocals lounge casually behind music that borders on shoegaze dreaminess but clings onto just enough bite...though they let that edge go on the tape's best track "Teenagers," which is nothing short of magnificent. This one just makes you feel good, something I rarely say about music that I share here. RADIANT MARKS
//3.bp.blogspot.com/-23XI8OutlFE/UX_hANy9EGI/AAAAAAAAHvA/j8eAPHfsY3A/s1600/radiant+marks+copy.jpg http://radiantmarks.bandcamp.com/

seo.title: Radiant Marks - Radiant Marks demo 2012 - Terminal Escape
